name: Wren Buehler
description: Remember, kids— you don’t have to be skilled to head a club. You just need to outlast everyone better than you.

name: Tali Goelman
description: “There is no subject as juxtaposed between art and history as philosophy. On one hand, it is in touch with the exact science of historical context, and on the other, it is a subjective artistic interpretation of the way of living.” - Map R Test

name: Nicholas Daum
description: What they don’t know is that I’m using a vast sweatshop of monkeys to write all my articles. One day they’ll finish one.

name: Liv Dentoni
description: We are decidedly not all in this together.

name: Bruno Chong
description: This bio has been redacted by The Administration for clarity.

name: Sanjana Surendran
description: You’ll either catch me sleeping or meticulously planning my path to world domination. Be afraid.

name: Grug
description: Grug am learned. Grug am have bachelor’s degree in art history from Cavern University. Do not make harmful assumption about Grug.

name: Dr. Reese Sessions
description: Dr. Reese Sessions is the Chief Economics Contributor to The Snitch. He has a PHD from the London School Of Economics and is critically acclaimed for his landmark paper on 'Eating The Irish As A Solution To World Hunger.'

name: Jake Krillen
description: Bro, I'm only here in case a football scholarship can't cut it.
